unnormalised: Okay, mhonnlle konnem tori karzachea porotfade vishean vicharlem… Soth sangpak zata, EMI somzop mhonnlle Bollywoodachim gitam kiteak astitvant asat tem somzonk provas korop. Kitemuch tarkik nhoi, fokot drama.
normalised: Barobar, konnen tori rinnache fatim bhorpane vixim vicharle… Sotachen sangtale zalear, E-M-I somzun gheup mhonnlear Bollywoodachim gitam kiteak astat tem somzun gheupa sarkhem asa. Kosloch tark na, fokot natak.

unnormalised: Dhor Sharmajin SBI koddsun ₹5,00,000 chea vyoktigot karzachem 12% vorosak vaddi ratek 5 vorsanchea khatir ghetlem. Atam, bankicho monis tumkam EMI chem amount dakoitolo, sumar ₹11,122 dor mhoineaak. Tem thik dista, barabor? Chukichem! To sukhench tem visarot asa je poilea 2 vorsanchea khatir, tumi diotat to sogllo vaddi asta. Tumi bankichem poket vaddoytat ani tumchem mool dhan utthun hansta.
normalised: Sharmajin panch lakh rupianchem vyaktigat rinn S-B-I koddlean bara tokke vorosk ritichean panch vorsank ghetlem mhonnum-ia. Atam, bankacho monis tumkam E-M-I chea rupiank ujvadd dakoitolo, sumar ekara hazar ekso vis ani don rupia dor mhoinea pormonnem. Hem vazyem dista, barobar? Chukichem! To survatechea don vorsank chukounk favo te bhag chukouta, mhonllear tumi fokot vyaj bhorpachem. Tumhi bankichem duvad daddkoritat tanchea mulachea bosun asta ten’na, haso korun.

unnormalised: Mhojea chachak Rs. 10,00,000 chem karz Gurgaonant ek flat viktem gheunk poddlem. To husharpon kortolo mhonn chintun to ek lamb kallank mand zalem, sumar 20 vorsank. EMI komi asli, fokot Rs. 8,000 dor mhoineaak. Tankam tem kollonk naslem (ani mhaka legit naslem, tbh, mhaje bailem diagram ani flowchart vaprun tem somzaillem poriant) ki tankam sumar Rs. 25,00,000 vaddi diunchi poddli. Title ponnank tumi *ani ek* flat gheunk xoktat, tumkam kitench borem Gurgaonant te ponnak mellta mhonn dhorlear, jem auto-rickshawacher yevpi unicorn melllea bhaxen asa.
normalised: Mhojea chachak Gurgaonant ek flat gheunk dha lakh rupianchem rinn mell’llem. To visarun raulo ki taka lambavechea kallak zai axillem, sumar vis voros. E-M-I kami axilli, fokot aath hazar rupia dor mhoinea pormonnem. Kiteak taka ghoddlem na (ani maka na, soteachem sangtale zalear, mhojea bailen ddyagrams ani flowcharts vaprun sangun sangosor) tem mhonllear taka sumar don point panch lakh rupianchem vyaj bhorchem poddttolem. Hem ek *dusrem* flat gheunk puro, tumi kiteim Gurgaonant vazyem kitim mellounk zata mhonntoch, tem auto-rickshawacher bosun aslolea unicornak mellounk sarkhem asa.

unnormalised: Ani tednam asa karzachi porotfade chi shiksha. Konn konn banki, khas korun sarkari banki, tumi tumchem karz poilim bhorunk sodtalea zalear fees ghetat. Gambhirponnan? Tumi tankam tankanchi pon dilole tumi punar vaprunk sodtat ani te tumkam shiksha ditat? Tem jevnakhatir athunk apounk ani pormonn tumchi hawa uchvas ghetlea mhonn diyak duksa diup bhaxen asa. Mhonnun, kagdacher sign korche adim, bankichea monxak porotfadechi shiksha vishean vichar. Zalki to Bollywoodchim gitam gaunk lagta ani tumche dolleancheak sampork chukauta, palai.
normalised: Ani tedna asa pre-payment penalty nattak. Kaim banks, mukhelponnan sarkari banki, azun porian dukheiche paise gheunk poddtat tumi tumchem rinn poilem bhoronk chatan zalear. Gandive! Tumhi tankam tanche paise *fatim* diunk sodtat ani te tumkam penalize kortat? Hem jevnankhatir pasreak apoita ani tumchea havak sas gheuncheak tankam gheunk sarkhem asa. Mhonnttoch, tumi kagleak sign korche poilem, bankichea monxak prepayment chargesache vixim prashn korat. Zori to Bollywoodachea gitamche gun-gun korun dolle dhakounk lagta zalear, polam.

unnormalised: Ani tumi tankam utthounk legit naka jem sukshm porinnamam vishean. Tem font size -2, Sanskritint boroilelem asa, ani sambout astrophysicsant PhD zai tem uktte korcheak. Tumkam ek vakil, ek anuvadok, ani sambout ek padrinch zai tem patr pavitrak korunk tumi sign korche adim. Lokpal zalugunke fees, processing fees (je fokot bankika fatt koruk dhan asa), ani dhirayen dhiray diyak duksa vishean sodanch vichar. Rs. 500 duksa komi dista pun tem Delhi trafikin faste vaddta.
normalised: Ani fine printache vixim maka suru korunakai. Tem font size minus donant, Sanskritant boroylam, ani astrophycsant P-H-D zaunchek zait. Tumkam ek vakil, ek translator ani dhormok axirvad diunk ek padre zait. Sodeak, adlea chargesa vixim vicharat, processing fees (te bankichea udheganthir sodeanche paise zatat), ani late payment penalties vixim. Panchx rupianchi penalty kami dista, punn te Delhi trafficchea thun-thunkhan bhorpurt vaddtat.

unnormalised: Kothechim mulya? Karzachea porotfadek tumi goddsann pani purik sambhavit vaprumk mhonn manat. Tem zoddi zankun kachik poddum naka ki tumi khala tumi utthounk dharik poddtalet. Tumkam diyak dusrea vaddeachim molak uchcharat, sambhavit porotfadechi manddani kar, ani sukshm porinnamam vagar (tumkam magnify korop ani decoder ring zai poddlea zalear).
normalised: Katha saronk? Rinnachem fatim bhorpanak masaleche pani puri sarkhem sambhallat. Responsibly magat. "Low E-M-I" fantastachea zait panthant bhoronakai tumi fatim dukhi zata astanam. Bhortolea vyajeanchi vishoyank, prepayment vixim nirnoy korat, ani fine print vachat (magnifying glass ani decoder ringacher zai zalear).

unnormalised: P.S. Hanv konnachin arthik updesh ditalo monis nhoi, hanv fokot ek monis kiteaki ponacho porinnam kharab zaleat. Hem fokot ek sangatik dukha pasun ek yadostik updesh. Sambhalun chol, ani sambout ek khorem specialist vishean ek expert karak tumi Rs 20,00,000 chen karz suru korunk dharik poddche adim! Borem zaunk di ani tumche EMI dev tumachea favorin asunk di. Tumkam punar vaddeachem ratek manank chukunk zai; tem ratek 15% vorosak asunk sambhavit asa!
normalised: P-S. Hanv financial advisor nam, hanv fokot ek monis zaun asa je ek khup chukim paishechen kelo. Hi fokot doganchem dukhi axillem sovkarian dilya budi zata. Sabdhanin vachat, ani tumhi don lakhamche rinn gheunchek poilem tumchem start-up korunk ek kharo expertak vicharat! Shubkamna ani tumchi E-M-I devak tumchi favor mellovunk poddtat. Tumkam tunchim interesantem rate poriant zannvo zay; rate ekdam pandravak tokke voros ritichean thoddi vaddta astam!
